title: Value of funds raised through crowdfunding globally 2014 to 2016
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Amount in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 3 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2016.
